name: Super Flower Lion!
description:
This game was made for the WOWIE game jam.

Sorry for any inconvenience with having to reload the page to play another time, as I didn't have time to add a respawn

This was the first 3-day game jam I did, the other game jam I did was a week-long, so this was a very different experience.

In this game, there is not just a straightforward way to succeed, you decide when you win!

The jump sound effect was from SFXR, but I made everything else myself, as I wanted to try to work with 16-pixel art and a limited color palate.

Colors I used:

  • #000000
  • #4caf50
  • #795548
  • #c7f0f5
  • #e91e62
  • #ffeb3b
  • #ffc107

I hope you enjoy it!
